body:
That's it

Edit (2020-09-30): This thread is now for bugs that I find/found but am too lazy to report to the admins/have already mentioned on ruqqus before but am too lazy to do again/have mentioned on ruqqus before but comment went missing after migration/too lazy to write more info about/just stuff I noticed that may or may not be a bug

Too lazy to check if they've been fixed

1. Banned subs thing (sieging, etc.)
2. Blocked user thing in guilds you mod (comments made before yanking)
3. If logged out, you can only view a random post, but there are more options if you're logged in
4. A. go to left sidebar, B. hover over the arrow until "Collapse" appears, C. click on it, D. "Collapse" message still appears
5. NSFL settings just don't work
6. I flagged a post for being off topic in this guild but nothing happens
7. The /mod/queue page is *just different* (like, the metadata went in the body rather than the head)
8. I can add endless summer links to comments via edits but not in first revision https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c (unsure if bug)

And text changes that I want:

1. "Guild names must be 3-25 letters or numbers. " should be "Guild names must be 3-25 letters, numbers, or underscores and can not start with an underscore"
2. Box says "comment posted" when you edit your comment but should say "Comment edited"
3. "+SomeGuild is rated NSFW (Not Safe for Work). You must be 18 or older to continue. Are you sure you want to proceed?" No it's the post itself that's NSFW

Features/small changes I'd like to see:

1. A link to the rules in the right sidebar
2. Editing your post doesn't reload the entire page
3. Comment timestamps (someone else was working on it I think)

  2. Box says "comment posted" when you edit your comment but should say "Comment edited"

guild.description:
Just some guild Do you like the color white? Now some of the text on here is unreadable! Edit: I changed the color code to "2-3-4-" I see that they changed it so it would use a default theme now *** "Too much spam!" https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c *** Tables
Tables Table test
Table test 1 Table test 2

title: Making a post in a restricted guild

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
I don't want to risk getting rid of the Endless Summer link, so I'm copying and pasting my whole post here.

Edit (2020-09-30): This thread is now for bugs that I find/found but am too lazy to report to the admins/have already mentioned on ruqqus before but am too lazy to do again/have mentioned on ruqqus before but comment went missing after migration/too lazy to write more info about/just stuff I noticed that may or may not be a bug

Too lazy to check if they've been fixed (also I think some have already been reported before)

1. Banned subs thing (sieging, etc.)
2. Blocked user thing in guilds you mod (comments made before yanking)
3. If logged out, you can only view a random post, but there are more options if you're logged in
4. A. go to left sidebar, B. hover over the arrow until "Collapse" appears, C. click on it, D. "Collapse" message still appears
5. NSFL settings just don't work
6. I flagged a post for being off topic in this guild but nothing happens
7. The /mod/queue page is just different (like, the metadata went in the body rather than the head)
8. I can add endless summer links to comments via edits but not in first revision (oh, yeah, can't link to that video anymore)
9. Dollar signs are A-OK (sign up field)
10. "Be the first to comment!" doesn't disappear when you post a comment
11. (2020-10-13): Annoying side effects after being banned and not logging out and logging back in: 1. you can't edit posts the box just vanishes 2. can't siege guilds just says you're banned (i almost thought i was banned again)

And text changes that I want:

1. "Guild names must be 3-25 letters or numbers. " should be "Guild names must be 3-25 letters, numbers, or underscores and can not start with an underscore"
2. Box says "comment posted" when you edit your comment but should say "Comment edited"
3. "+SomeGuild is rated NSFW (Not Safe for Work). You must be 18 or older to continue. Are you sure you want to proceed?" No it's the post itself that's NSFW

Features/small changes I'd like to see:

1. A link to the rules in the right sidebar
2. Editing your post doesn't reload the entire page
3. Comment timestamps (someone else was working on it I think)
4. Indicators for [links with title text](#ruq "Test") (because why have title text if no one's going to see it?)

  11. (2020-10-13): Annoying side effects after being banned and not logging out and logging back in: 1. you can't edit posts the box just vanishes 2. can't siege guilds just says you're banned (i almost thought i was banned again)

And text changes that I want:

  1. "Guild names must be 3-25 letters or numbers. " should be "Guild names must be 3-25 letters, numbers, or underscores and can not start with an underscore"
  2. Box says "comment posted" when you edit your comment but should say "Comment edited"
